page.title: 03Brixington Baby Club
page.content: Most mothers think{ Brixington}is a safe place for children to live and play in.Many had recently moved here and liked{Exmouth.}There is a need for more{nursery schools}but playgroups and toddler groups were thought to be adequate.Public transport is good ,but mothers did not use it.They take children with them when they go out but sometimes used baby sitters.They shop in town or at supermarkets,{not locally.Fisher Price toys were thought to be the safest and best. Most people questioned had gardens,but they were not always safe for playing in.Most children had friends of similar age to play with.{Langstone field} is not a good place to play in as it is not very safe and is used for exercising dogs although children and family pets usually get on well together.
